activities: VF Corporation receives, processes and uses personal data from its EU/EEA and/or Switzerland based offices to carry out its obligations under employment and benefit laws, to administer employee participation in its benefit, compensation and human resources plans and programs, for performance management, quality monitoring, and for compliance reporting and investigation. VF Corporation also contracts with third party providers to render related services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources Data, on-line, off-line, and manually processed data
recoursemech: Claims arising out of or relating to our adherence to the Safe Harbor Principles, or the breach thereof, that cannot be resolved through our internal processes after thirty (30) days will be resolved under the conflict resolution procedures of the appropriate local European Data Protection Authorities or the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner, respectively.
